IndexPage.title: next-intl example
IndexPage.description: Welcome to the Next.js Internationalization (i18n) example! This demo showcases the power of the App Router and how to manage multilingual content seamlessly using next-intl.

About.title: About Our Project
About.text: VoxMentor is your guide in the world of education and professional development! Our project is an innovative platform designed for convenient interaction between teachers and students.
About.text_2: We aim to make education accessible and engaging for everyone. Our goal is to provide a space where teachers can share their expertise and knowledge, and students can find courses that interest them.
About.text_3: The voxMentor website allows teachers to register and showcase their portfolios, where they can present their experience and specialization. Additionally, teachers can create and publish courses in their field of expertise.
About.text_4: We welcome anyone who shares our commitment to education and development. Join voxMentor now to start your educational journey!

Course.accessdenied: You do not have access. To view it you need to subscribe to the author !
